title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button moves down and is no longer on the same line as the label.
EB: The close button and the label should always stay on the same line, regardless of the view size. The close button should be located to the far right corner of the label.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe the close button moving down from the label.
